```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
```


```{r message = FALSE}
file_names <- list.files("./data/", full.names = TRUE)

df <- file_names %>% 
  map(read_csv)

for (i in 1:20) {
  if (i < 11) {
    df[[i]] <- df[[i]] %>% 
    mutate(arm = "con", 
           study_id = i)
  } else if (i > 10) {
    df[[i]] <- df[[i]] %>% 
      mutate(arm = "exp", 
             study_id = i)
  }
}
```
